name: Unicoin
tagline: A great alternative cryptocurrency for anyone to invest in.
body:
### Welcome to the Unicoin Repository
Unicoin is one of the newest cryptocurrecies on available. If you are just getting started in cryptocurrencies now is your time to jump on the boat! Are you one of the many people who wished they had bought and hoarded bitcoin when it was being sold for pennies? I understand where you are coming from and that is why I wanted to create a currency for people like us. Cryptocurrency is about making money and nothing else. I want you to make as much money as possible with my coin and I plan on turning it into a long-term investment, high-value coin. I am in this for the long haul and I plan on making a lot of money. Do you?

### Authors and Contributors
I am the main author and developer of Unicoin and if you would like to get involved please feel free to help! I can always use a hand with development or many other things!

### Support or Contact
To be added to soon. For now feel free to send me a message on here.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
